Package bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.ui

Class HeadsUpDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.ui.Overlay
      • bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.ui.HeadsUpDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetricListener, Drawable, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    class HeadsUpDisplay
extends Overlay
implements MetricListener
    The HeadsUpDisplay displays persistent player and game information throughout the gameplay.
    Author:
    ENG1 Team 23 (Cohort 3)

        Creates a new HeadsUpDisplay relating to the given SpriteBatch
        Parameters:
        batch - The SpriteBatch to which the HeadsUpDisplay should be connected
        leftMetrics - The MetricController.Metric elements to be displayed on the left-hand side
        rightMetrics - The MetricController.Metric elements to be displayed on the right-hand side
